thread.title: Great night sleep in convenient location
thread.title_full: Great night sleep in convenient location - Review of Radisson Blu Edwardian Vanderbilt, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Steven B
title: Great night sleep in convenient location
text: The hotel is conveniently located near the tube station on the main high street in Kensington where there are plenty of shops and restaurants such as Ask, Waitrose, Boots and Sainsburys within a 5 minute walk. The hotel itself is quite small built into the former property of the Vanderbilt family. Check-in I did online in advance where I was allowed to pre-select my room. This meant that my room key was waiting for me at the concierge - very smooth and efficient. Check-out was similarly efficient. The standard double room was small but cosy and the temperature and noise levels perfect which meant I had one of the best nights sleep I have ever had in a hotel. The breakfast in the morning was buffet style, which is not ideal as some of the hot items clearly needed some refreshing - that said there was a good selection including freshly squeezed juices. For fans of the rock band Queen, the hotel is a short distance from the former home of Freddie Mercury - Garden Lodge.
